name: Dweller of the Caverns
description:
General info

This was originally made for a school project, but I decided to improve, expand and publish it. 

This game is free, however if you enjoyed it, donations are appreciated!

To run the game, you'll need to use Scratch. It can be downloaded or ran in the browser.  Once you've got it open, select File > Load from your computer, and then the game file. Once it's been loaded, press the green flag, and go into full screen mode if you so wish.

The game cannot be saved so once you close Scratch, you'll have to start from the beginning when reopening it.

Controls:

  • Z - Interact/Sprint
  • X - Attack (You don't have to spam it, once the staff is out you're in an attack state as long as you hold X. Beware that the staff is a part of your hitbox!)
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • 0 - +volume
  • 9 - -volume
  • Everything else is explained within the game.
Fancy description

Traverse a generic, long-forgotten ancient kingdom, consisting of over 70 hand-crafted rooms, and acquire powerful abilities that will help you against fair, but challenging bosses in half-assed Souls-lite combat.
